function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of compliance with public health measures","Impact":"Increased spread of contagious diseases and higher mortality rates","Mitigation":"Enhance public health education and communication, enforce regulations and guidelines, and increase access to healthcare resources","Technologies":"Health information systems, contact tracing apps, and telemedicine","People":"General public, healthcare workers, and vulnerable populations","Owner":"Government, healthcare organizations, and civil society"},{"Description":"Lack of transparent and effective governance","Impact":"Failure to respond effectively to a major crisis, leading to widespread consequences and loss of public trust","Mitigation":"Transparent and accountable leadership, investment in state capacity, and robust public health policies","Technologies":"Digital governance tools, communication platforms, and data analysis systems","People":"Government officials, policymakers, and public health organizations","Owner":"Government, international organizations, and civil society"},{"Description":"Delay in implementing adequate controlling measures","Impact":"Prolonged spread of the disease, overwhelmed healthcare systems, and higher death toll","Mitigation":"Early recognition of the problem, swift implementation of regulations, and coordination with healthcare authorities","Technologies":"Health surveillance systems, data analytics, and predictive modeling","People":"General public, healthcare workers, and vulnerable populations","Owner":"Government, public health agencies, and local authorities"}]}
